head.title: SPARQL Query Results XML Format Namespace

body.h1: SPARQL Query Results XML Format Namespace
body.p: The namespace name http://www.w3.org/2005/sparql-results# is intended for use with the SPARQL Query Results XML Format. The following formal descriptions are available:

Warning: Until the specification reaches W3C Candidate Recommendation (CR) status, this namespace name may be reused by any update in such a way as to cause documents written using the namespace to become invalid or to change in meaning.

p.em: This document is intended to comply with W3C policy for XML namespace names.

body.p: This namespace replaces an earlier namespace, http://www.w3.org/2005/06/sparqlResults#.
body.address:
Eric Prud'hommeaux, W3C Team Contact for the RDF Data Access Working Group <eric@w3.org>
Dan Connolly, chair, RDF Data Access Working Group
